data.message: Lil Wayne is a better lyrically than EM .. want proof go listen to pop bottles or fireman... real hip hop Eminem's songs are boring AF.. He is white ffs.. no flow no bars just straight up doodooooo... And if any one wants to prove me wrong come at me Bitches
